rule: The list of people names must not include any entities that are not explicitly identified as people.
input: Text: Bill Gates is working alongside charities to improve global health, not Microsoft directly.
validityText:
The input text "Bill Gates is working alongside charities to improve global health, not Microsoft directly." contains names of people ("Bill Gates") and a company ("Microsoft"). It also includes a specific topic related to the content, which is improving global health. Additionally, the text is in a human-readable format and understandable language, English. The information provided is complete in conveying the association between a person and an initiative without requiring additional context or information, thus fulfilling the requirement of having relevant entities in the text. None of the guidelines specified in the input specification are violated.

No violation.
OK
